```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### Default style

```{r}
library(reactable)
data <- iris[1:5, ]

reactable(data)
```

### Borderless

```{r}
reactable(data, bordered = FALSE)
```

### Striped

```{r}
reactable(data, striped = TRUE)
```

### Outlined

```{r}
reactable(data, outlined = TRUE)
```

### Outlined + striped

```{r}
reactable(data, outlined = TRUE, striped = TRUE)
```

### Outlined + borderless

```{r}
reactable(data, outlined = TRUE, bordered = FALSE)
```
